value:
My brother entrusted me with
Reginleif. In order to protect my
people, I will do all I can to master it!

I wouldn't be the person I am today
without the support of others. I won't
let their faith in me go to waste.

This armor was made to be like my
brother's. It's very easy to move
around in.

You work incredibly hard, no matter
the time of day. It inspires me to work
harder myself.

I thought I'd style my hair a bit
differently than usual. Do you
like it?

I am Eirika, princess of Renais. I've
come to deliver a small gift from
$Nf.

I will wield this spear now so that
one day I will no longer have to.

My brother taught me this spear
technique. How's my form?

If the fighting continues...will it be
my fault for lacking the strength
to end it?

Your support gives me the strength
to keep moving forward. I will not
let you down!

I am Eirika, princess of Renais. With
Reginleif, the spear entrusted to me
by my brother, I will protect Askr!

In our battles with Grado, I always
had someone there to protect me.$k$pWhether it was my brother or one of
countless friends, it's thanks to them
that I was able to fight to the end.$k$pI do not wish for war. I believe we
have more to gain from cooperation
than from conflict.$k$pBut... If war finds us and we run from
it, we won't be able to protect those
precious to us, nor our ideals.$k$pIf I can be brave, I may be able to
end the fighting. I want to be the
protector this time.$k$pA battle to end battles... I have faith
that, with you by my side, we can
accomplish that goal.
やあっ
止めます！
うあっ…
なんてこと…
I cannot fall!
My strength is my conviction!
I will be your lance!
Keep your eyes on me!
Am I not strong enough?
*Exhale*
What do you think of this armor? It's just like my brother's. I know we're twins, but...
Enough mischief, Ephraim! Oh, it's you, summoner. My apologies.
There are those who have faith in me... When I think of that, I feel strength well up inside.
I'm so very glad I could be of service to you.
I learned how to wield a spear from my brother.
Tell me... Would you be pleased to hear that I hope we never part?
I used to be so unsure, and understood the world so little. That has changed, and I thank you for your part in it.
My orders?
Hmm, yes...
Leave it to me.
